attributes.action: To end the discrimination against London old age pensioners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: withholding the london weighting allowance, that is payable to MPs and workers within london, pensioners who have the same additional living costs, are at a severe disadvantage to the rest of the country, the fact that the old age pension does not reflect the cost of living anyway, in London the situation is even worse.
